info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9983
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9983
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
pad.incubateur.net.	3586	IN	CNAME	betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 11745
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 11745
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
pad.incubateur.net.	3600	IN	CNAME	betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	3600	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2277339532 10000 2400 604800 3600

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: pad.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Connection: close Content-Length: 140 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 03 Jul 2022 06:42:12 GMT Hedgedoc-Version: 1.8.2 Referrer-Policy: same-origin Set-Cookie: connect.sid=s%3AEGr_w7h2szH0n4a3z7Ahmntr1arAGlWU.2zri%2B0oEf0VkVhr6QNZLOgBDd3Spkr3UzCKkrhMxYLs; Path=/; Expires=Sun, 17 Jul 2022 06:42:12 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Lax Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Powered-By: Express X-Request-Id: e72954cb-a699-498a-9678-76578730ac29 Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: pad.incubateur.net' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://pad.incubateur.net/'
